title.rendered: Kurt Nye Appears on Smart Money Circle Podcast

content.rendered: Kurt Nye, Group Head of Alternative Investments, joined the Smart Money Circle Podcast to discuss leading MAI Capital’s alternative investments practice and their strategy of evaluating investments based on understanding economic drivers and risks while ensuring a fit with their overall views.

excerpt.rendered: Kurt Nye, Group Head of Alternative Investments, joined the Smart Money Circle Podcast to discuss leading MAI Capital’s alternative investments practice and their strategy of evaluating investments based on understanding economic drivers and risks while ensuring a fit with their overall views.
